While credited as a Tom and Jerry cartoon, this is not the cat-and-mouse team but an earlier Mutt-and-Jeff rip-off featuring them going about to survive in today's turbulent world. In the episode, titled MEAN SOCCER WEEK, the boys must prove their abilities in the new pay-to-play sport. Then we meet two females from out of town who've come to visit the cutest boys in town.

Snow White is in my opinion a bad movie on an artistic point of view. The plot is pretty much foreseeable, the characters are stereotypes, the editing too. The movie is pale by its external form, and the title sounds like a romance story. The biggest mistake to me is that : parody or not, this movie has taken a good literary character, prided of enough cult following, and made a worst version. The movie doesn’t have anything to do with the story

This film is going to be criticized by some because it has very little coherence to either martial arts or science fiction.
